game.name: Ravens Rest
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A horror adventure game following Rosanna, a thief tasked with breaking into Ravens Rest state park and retrieving and experiment. Things quickly take a turn however, as she discovers what the true nature of the experiment had in store.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A horror adventure game following Rosanna, a thief tasked with breaking into Ravens Rest state park and retrieving and experiment. Things quickly take a turn however, as she discovers what the true nature of the experiment had in store.
